text: They could remake this game for the switch, bigger stages, more fluid gameplay, more weapons, daily weapon loot BUT NO FRIKING PAID DLC BS, more characters for multiplayer and more modes, HD remake graphics, secret bosses, new story paths, multiplayer (Pit and some other angel/dark pit/magnus)

author: RascalTC

text: Kid Icarus: Uprising is definitely a 3DS game worth getting. Everything about it is great: the soundtrack, the gameplay, the story, the graphics, and even the humor. The controls may feel iffy in the beginning, but you get the hang out of it later, especially once you tinker around with the control options.

text: The controls arent hard, they're just VERY straining on your wrists. It's a baaaad control scheme if your hand hurts after an hour of playing.

text: I wish you all a great year 2013 filled with joy and success! This is a game I'll need to play, I knew it was good but I've seen a lot of people place it near or even at the top of their 2012 GOTY list. The soundtrack is top notch. I can already read some people say there are tons of more popular choices than this one, but after 5 years do I still need to explain the point of this personal list and the very rigorous/scientific process I go through when deciding which track to upload?
